scripts.deploy: npm run build && eb list && eb use udagram-api-dev && eb deploy && eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD PORT_DB=$PORT_DB PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST RDS_DIALECT=$RDS_DIALECT AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET URL=$URL JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET --profile default
scripts.build: npm install . && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
